702266f-b.text:
3rd Avenue, at 18th Street, looking northwestward across the area where the Gowanus Parkway is being constructed. Note the piles and pile driver. The parkway will be an elevated highway, part of the Belt Parkway system.

P. L. Sperr
April 21, 1941
Views 1,2,3

702266f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, at 18th Street, looking northwestward across the area where the Gowanus Parkway is being constructed. Note the piles and pile driver. The parkway will be an elevated highway, part of the Belt Parkway system.

P. L. Sperr

Views 1,2,3

702266f-c.text:
3rd Avenue, at 18th Street, looking northwestward across the area where the Gowanus Parkway is being constructed. Note the piles and pile driver. The parkway will be an elevated highway, part of the Belt Parkway system.

P. L. Sperr
April 21, 1941
Views 1,2,3

704662f-b.text:
3rd Avenue, north from 18th Street and showing piles for the new Gowanus Parkway that will be constructed. The construction of the parkway necessitated the razing of many buildings on
both side of the avenue.
View 2 is north from Hamilton Avenue. View 3 shows the block from Prospect Avenue to 17th Street, looking south.
P. L. Sperr  April 21, 1941
Views 1,2,3

704662f-c.text:

Views 1,2,3

704662f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, north from 18th Street and showing piles for the new Gowanus Parkway that will be constructed. The construction of the parkway necessitated the razing of many buildings on

P. L. Sperr  April 21, 1941
Views 1,2,3

702265f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, north from 18th Street, across Hamilton Avenue. The latter proceeds northwestward, from where the automobile can be seen turning in from the left near the wooden fence. The buildings on the left are being torn down and the area will be-come part of Gowanus Parkway, a link in the Belt Parkway system
of highways.
View 2 shows the buildings at the N.W. corner of 18th Street.
P. L. Sperr  October 23, 1940
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2
View 3: The N.E. corner of Third Avenue and 18th Street, during demolition.
July 22, 1940

702267f-c.text:
3rd Avenue, east side, south from 18th Street, showing the buildings that were demolished later in the year, when the avenue was widened to become part of the northerly extension of the Belt
Parkway.
View 1. July 23, 1940
View 2: Oct. 23, 1940
P. L. Sperr

Note: View 2 shows the west side of the avenue, from 21st to 20th Streets.

702268f-b.text:
3rd Avenue, north from 20th Street to 18th Street, showing demolition of buildings on the north side of the avenue. Gowanus Parkway will be constructed here.

View 2 shows the block from 19th to 18th Streets. View 3 is the east side of the avenue, at 19th Street.

P.L. Sperr
Views 1,2: October 23, 1940
View 3: April 21, 1941
